dc:title: Visitors Criticism, CIO Convention
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Collection of little stories: visitors, helping Tamar with homework, praying to St. Joseph for money, reading Pelle the Conqueror, and attending a CIO convention. Affirms her "faith in the tremendous spiritual capacities of man."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 336 1938-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
